taskbody.context: This task describes how to find and open a resource by searching for its name. This is very helpful when you only have the resource's name and not its location.

step.stepresult: The Open Resource dialog is displayed. The dialog box is composed by one filter and a list of matching items.

step.cmd: Use the text field to filter the resource name. The string you enter filters all resource containing the input string in its name.
step.stepresult: The matching list is filtered. Location of selected is displayed under the list.

step.cmd: Select the line in the matching item list and click on OK button to open the resource.

taskbody.result: The selected resource is opened with the associated editor.
